title: Uyirin Melloru Uyir Vanthu Lyrics Vadacurry Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Uyirin Melloru Uyir Vanthu
Singer(s): Priya Hemesh, Sathyan
Movie: Vadacurry
Music: Yuvan
Lyrics: Niranjan Bharathi

Uyirin Melloru Uyir Vanthu kalandhaal
idhayam irupadhu vinvelithaney.
Idharkku per enna kadhaley
indha nilai varakkaranam neethaaney.
unakkaaga nenjam saayumey
adhuthaan kadavul varamey.

Uyirin Melloru Uyir Vanthu kalandhaal
idhayam irupadhu vinvelithaney.
Uyirin Melloru Uyir Vanthu kalandhaal

Nodiyedhum theriyaamal
vizhigal rendum pesudhey.
Vizhiyodu vizhi serndhaal
pudhiya mozhi thonudhey.

Vali kooda sugam thaaney
idhu kadhal mugam thaaney.
Rasithaenadi dhinam dhinam.

Uyirin Melloru Uyir Vanthu kalandhaal
idhayam irupadhu vinvelithaney.
Uyirin Melloru Uyir Vanthu kalandhaal

Veyilodu mazhai thoova
paruvangalai maathinaai.
vizhi irandinil medhuvaaga
undadhu eeram oottrinaal.

Indha kadhal kadandhaaley
..dhegam thulithaney.
Azhaipayudhey manam manam.

Uyirin Melloru Uyir Vanthu kalandhaal
idhayam irupadhu vinvelithano.
Idharkku per enna kadhaley
indha nilai varakkaranam neethaaney.
unakkaaga nenjam saayumey
adhuthaan kadavul varamey.
